2020 DraftKings League

2019 Week 7 Results

geru | 22 Oct 2019

Congratulations to this week’s winners:

  1. glopez28 - 181.46 fpts
  2. XplicitK - 175.92 fpts
  3. jlopez0809 - 170.40 fpts

glopez28 placed for the first time this season with the help of Aaaron Rodgers (46.76 fpts $6,400) and Marvin Jones (43.3 fpts $5,000), who also happened to be the top scoring players this week. XplicitK and jlopez0809 both made their returns to the winners’ circle this week and add to their season total cash winnings with picks including Jared Goff (25.02 fpts $6,200) and Dalvin Cook (30.9 fpts $8,000). After these 3 winners, everyone else was left in the dust, with 4th place (olivadotij) scoring just 145.5 fpts.

Please remember to submit to the correct contest this week. Once the auto-run contest goes unfilled for two weeks it will stop generating and there will be no more confusion. Until then, just use the Submit Lineup in the site menu. Good luck in Week 8! Commissioner Maduro, out.

Week 8 Bye teams: Baltimore, Dallas

MVP (Most fpts)
Sleeper (Most fpts per salary)
Bust (Least fpts per salary > $5000)
Draft Dodger (Most fpts undrafted)
